Lenovo (Lenovo) as an equipment support not only provides the hardware and also provides software services. This software called EasySync (Android backup) requires you to provide some personal information so that it can provide you with a better service. This information includes the phone number, IMEI, contacts, photos, SMS, and so on. In order to effectively protect the legitimate rights for your personal information, Lenovo use the following instructions according to association information collection:

When you use the backup/restore function, you must have account, registration account need to provide phone number or IMEI. But any personal information will not be matched storage. If you backup your phone data, data will be uploaded to Lenovo storage backup server, to ensure that in the future that will be restored.
This application is free. When you use the backup feature, you can just click “go to backup”. This will emerge SMS fee and this fee is charged by the carrier.
The first step is to register the software. The SMS fee occurred by one key registration function is also charged by the carrier.

Backup/Restore “Contact”, “SMS”, “MMS”, “Call log”, “Photo”, “App” is an optional feature and only after you choose to use the service then EasySync could work. In order to ensure data safety, Lenovo will server to take strict security measures, Lenovo will strictly protect the security of such information, including the use of various means of security technology to protect such information from unauthorized access, use or leak. While the data recovery process does not delete the existing data on the phone, you can rest assured that traffic flow costs cost for operators to relevant regulations. This data can be deleted or modified. Your personal data can be backed up to the phone memory or SD card, without networking can also backup/restore your personal data, all local and cloud backup data encryption processing to ensure that your private data is not used by any unauthorized program view or access. At the same time, Lenovo will not read the user backup data content.
Lenovo is not without lawful authority, open, edit or disclose the data backup process for your personal information, unless:
(1)In accordance with the relevant state laws and regulations;
(2)In the case of an emergency, to safeguard your interests and public;
(3)In order to safeguard the association of trademark right, patent right and any other legal rights;
(4)In accordance with the other to open, edit, or revealed that the above information legal situation.
If force majeure occurs at following situation, Lenovo do not assume any responsibilities. But the association will do our best to maintain your rights and interests and will inform you:
(2)The significant impact of the telecom operators;
(3)Because the government control and lead to network, website shut down;
(5)Natural disasters, war and other not reasonable control, unexpected or even foresee also inevitable event.

If you use the Lenovo offers services such as data backup, indicates that you understand and agree with the above statement, and to authorize the association receives the personal information you provide, the personal information you provide and authorized Lenovo storage backup.

According to the development of products, Lenovo might be interested in the Privacy Statement, Privacy Policy modification. If the personal information policy changes, we will issue relevant information to inform to the user in the product and page significant position. If you choose to continue to use our services, you indicate that you will agree to accept these changes.
Dear, control data management via your PC. Please visit http://cloud.lenovo.com
